short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that lets users contribute to reforestation and ocean waste clean-up with every purchase at a partnered shop, for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Big Orange Bird browser extension lets you shop at your favourite sites and contribute to making the world a cleaner, healthier, and better place. 

Our goal is to partner with the largest e-commerce organisations and brands, and use affiliate income to help various environmental and societal initiatives. Through our links with charities such as One Tree Planted, we funnel the affiliate income to good causes. 

Because we use affiliate income generated through simply using the addon, you do not pay anything extra beyond the normal purchase price of any items.

You shop, we act.  

Supported initiatives:
- Reforestation 

Initiatives coming soon:
- Ocean waste clean-up
- Land waste clean-up
- Cancer research
- Alzheimer's research
- Various animal rescue and rehabilitation charities  

Partnered sites:
We currently only support Amazon UK, but have several thousand other brands lined up and coming soon through our affiliate network partnerships! 

Supported browsers:
The Big Orange Bird browser extension is supported on all major browsers.
